actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution designating a room in the Capitol as the "Styles Bridges Room."

summary.text: Designates the room located in the United States Capitol and known as number S-120 as the "Styles Bridges Room". Provides that any law, regulation, document, map, or record of the United States in which reference is made to this room shall be held and considered to be a reference to the "Styles Bridges Room". Authorizes the Committee on Rules and Administration to place an appropriate marker or inscription at a suitable location or locations to commemorate and designate such room.

titles.title: A resolution designating a room in the Capitol as the "Styles Bridges Room."
